title: Understanding Control Fields
text: A control field is a key concept in data management and analysis. It helps in organizing and sorting data efficiently.

title: Purpose of a Control Field
text: Think about how data is organized in a spreadsheet or database. What field would you use to sort the data?

hintAnswer: the field on which you sort
title: Identifying the Control Field
text: Which field would you use to sort the data in a table?
choices: the field on which you sort
the field on which you summarize
the field on which you do work
